divs: Sighting Detailswell in the efternoon around about 4pm, me and my friend was looking out my bedroom window, and i looked up at the mountain and i seen a dark objeck flowing very slowly across the side of the mountain. so i quickly rushed for my phone so i could take a picture for evidence. but strangely whot i could see wot not show up on the screen of my phone. it was very strange, i asked my friend to try and take one but she couldnt suceed on taking the picture either. funnely it looked asthough it was being toed. it was amazing, i have always thought i have seen a ufo but i have never bin sure, but this time i have never bin more sure, i new egsackly whot it was. it then passed over the top of the mountain. i felt really surprissed,i wonted to call the police everyminute i was watching it but i didnt want to miss a thing. and by the time i realised i shoulda rang them it was too late, it had gone!i was not scared cause i beleave, and i am a huge fan of the x files. THE TRUTH IS OUT THERE!!!
Summary: black with sharp corners slow moving
trends: There have been no other sightings in torfaen
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
